name: Dino Dash (skeldoor)
description:
Summary 

Play as a cute dinosaur named Dino, run as fast as you can from the meteors that are threatening to kill you off.  

You reckon you can take 6 hits before it's too much to handle. 

Use your shield to defend yourself from meteors and rocks but careful because using your shield will drain your score!

Enter yourself onto the global leaderboard!

Controls 

  • A - Move left (menus and dino)
  • D - Move right (menus and dino)
  • W - Move up in menus
  • S - Move up in menus
  • Space - Turn shield ON/OFF
Notes

Sometimes the pixel scaling isn't working as intended, if so try zooming your browser out a few clicks with Ctrl -   I've found 80% works best for me
